value: Cupcakes + Broccoli is led by Amanda Johnson.

It is not a generic platform or a faceless subscription product. It is a founder-led practice built around experience, judgment, and care. Membership, consulting, learning, and Blind Dinners all flow from that center.
People do not come here for hype.

notes: Amanda Johnson smiling in a studio portrait.

value: Amanda Johnson has spent her career inside complex systems where decisions matter.

She has led strategy and marketing work inside major organizations and advised senior leaders on initiatives tied to revenue, reputation, and growth. She understands how power moves and how decisions actually get made.
She has also worked closely with Black-owned small businesses navigating limited access and unclear rules. She understands what it means to build without a safety net.
Cupcakes + Broccoli lives at the intersection of those two realities.

notes: Amanda Johnson in a close studio portrait.

value: People who work with Amanda describe a consistent pattern.
She brings structure where there is chaos and momentum where things feel stuck. This approach shapes everything at Cupcakes + Broccoli.
See how this shows up in practice

notes: Amanda Johnson in a studio portrait

value: Cupcakes + Broccoli was created after a series of professional and personal inflection points.

After years inside corporate environments, Amanda experienced workplace harm, public undermining, and termination. She challenged that experience through formal channels and lost. What followed was uncertainty and the realization that institutional stability is often fragile, especially for Black women.

link: personal loss reshaped how she thought about time

value: Cupcakes + Broccoli exists because relying on systems that were not built for us is not a strategy.

notes: Amanda Johnson in a focused studio portrait.

value: Cupcakes + Broccoli is a membership-based ecosystem centered on guidance
An AI concierge built around real founder questions
This is not about hustle or constant growth. It is about building something sustainable

notes: Amanda Johnson smiling in a bright studio portrait.

value: A Core Expression of the Work
Blind Dinners are a core expression of this work.
They are small, invitation-based gatherings hosted by Amanda for Black founders. They are not networking events or panels. They are moments of trust and shared perspective.
Blind Dinners are intentionally limited and available to select members.

notes: Blind Dinner table setting with shared dishes.

value: You cannot live on cupcakes alone.
You also cannot thrive on broccoli alone.
This platform exists to help founders hold both.
